Energy Efficiency: Add an energy-efficient door that can automatically close when a certain temperature is reached, reducing drafts and saving energy.
Security Screen: Install a security screen that can be easily rolled down to prevent break-ins and provide an additional layer of protection for the home.
Weather Monitoring: Incorporate a weather monitoring system that alerts homeowners when the door is left open during extreme weather conditions, such as heavy rain or snow.
Voice Control: Integrate voice control technology that allows homeowners to open and close the door with voice commands, enhancing accessibility and convenience.
Automatic Closing: Implement an automatic closing mechanism that can detect when the door is left open and close it to prevent energy loss and save on utility bills.
